intro: Oreonana clementis, commonly known as the Clement's oreonana, is a succulent plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family and is characterized by its compact, low-growing form. The plant features dense clusters of fleshy, blue-green leaves that are often covered in a fine layer of white, powdery bloom. It produces small, star-shaped flowers in shades of yellow and orange during the spring and summer months. Oreonana clementis is well adapted to arid environments and requires minimal water once established.
